lemma assumes "rel_converter (A OO A') B C (R OO R') conv conv'" and A: "left_unique A" "right_total A" and A': "right_unique A'" "left_total A'" and R: "left_unique R" "right_total R" and R': "right_unique R'" "left_total R'" shows rel_witness_converter1: "rel_converter A (\<lambda>b (b', c). b = b' \<and> B b' c) (\<lambda>c (c', d). c = c' \<and> C c' d) R conv (rel_witness_converter A A' B C R R' (conv, conv'))" (is "?thesis1") and rel_witness_converter2: "rel_converter A' (\<lambda>(b, c') c. c = c' \<and> B b c') (\<lambda>(c, d') d. d = d' \<and> C c d') R' (rel_witness_converter A A' B C R R' (conv, conv')) conv'" (is "?thesis2")
